item.title: Talus integrates Sui to power AI agents
item.description: Talus, the next-gen platform for onchain AI agents, is joining forces with Sui, the blockchain which says it's built for mass adoption.

item.title: Shadow AI: How unapproved AI apps are compromising security, and what you can do about it
item.description: Security leaders and CISOs are discovering that a growing swarm of shadow AI apps has been compromising their networks for over a year.

item.title: Like it or not, AI is learning how to influence you
item.description: AI agents will soon be deployed that are tasked with decoding your personality so they can use those insights to optimally influence you.
